TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RequestNotificationStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the state of a notification in the request pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.RequestNotificationStatus> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
